name: Lisa
tagline: Discreet, polished presence for refined evenings and elegant occasions.
bio: My name is Lisa. I embody elegance, confidence, and refined femininity. I value discretion, intelligence, and meaningful connection, and I take pride in offering an experience that feels natural, polished, and exclusive.

I am attentive, well-spoken, and emotionally intuitive — someone who understands the art of presence and the importance of subtlety. I appreciate fine aesthetics, beautiful environments, and moments created with intention. Every encounter is approached with care, respect, and a sense of individuality.
If you are seeking a sophisticated companion who moves effortlessly in both intimate and social settings, I invite you to step into my world — where quality, calm, and elegance come first.
expectations: Tailored engagements shaped around your setting
boundaries: Mutual respect and discretion are essential. All arrangements are discussed clearly in advance.

rates.title: One Hour
rates.description: A focused, elegant meeting for private conversation.

rates.title: Two Hours
rates.description: Unhurried connection with room to settle into the moment.

rates.title: Evening
rates.description: An elevated evening designed around your plans.
